sense.def:
A stick
je dolg, tanek kos lesa, na primer odmrla veja.

seg.quote: I gathered some sticks to start the fire.

sense.def:
A stick of something
je dolg, tanek kos nečesa.

seg.quote: ...sticks of dynamite.

sense.def:
To stick a pointed object in something
pomeni v nekaj potisniti koničast predmet.

seg.quote: He stuck the knife right in.
He stuck a cigar in his mouth.

sense.def:
To stick one thing to another
pomeni pritrditi dve stvari skupaj z lepilom ali lepilnim trakom.

seg.quote: They went round sticking posters on walls.
Someone has stuck a label on the crate.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sticks somewhere
, je pritrjeno ali utrjeno v enem položaju in se ne more premakniti.

seg.quote: ...sand that sticks to your hair and skin.
If your zip sticks, it might be because a thread has caught in it.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sticks in one's mind
, se tistega dolgo spominjamo.

seg.quote: One lecture stuck in my mind.

sense.def:
To stick something somewhere
pomeni nekaj nekam malomarno položiti;

seg.quote: She closed the bag and stuck it back on the shelf.

sense.def:
To stick it
ali
to stick at it
ali
to stick it out
pomeni ne oditi ali obupati v težavnem položaju;

seg.quote: I don't know how I've stuck it. It's been hell.
You must stick at it if you want to succeed.
I stuck it out as long as I could.

sense.def:
To get the wrong end of the stick
pomeni nekaj popolnoma napak razumeti;

To stick around
pomeni ostati tam, kjer smo;

cit.quote: ostati na mestu, ostati v bližini

seg.quote: I'll stick around and keep an eye on the food.

sense.def:
To stick by someone
pomeni nekomu še naprej pomagati ali ga zagovarjati.

seg.quote: ...a good commanding officer who stuck by his men when they got into trouble.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sticks out
, se širi onstran nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: There was a little chimney sticking out of the roof.

sense.def:
To stick something out
pomeni poskrbeti, da se nekaj prikaže od znotraj ali izza nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: Lally stuck her head out of a window.
Lynn stuck out her tongue.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sticks out
, je zelo opazno.

seg.quote: His accent made him stick out.

sense.def:
To stick out for something
pomeni nekaj, kar si želimo, kar naprej zahtevati in ne sprejeti ničesar drugačnega ali manj.

seg.quote: He stuck out for twice the usual salary, and got it.

sense.def:
To stick to something
pomeni ostati blizu nečesa ali pri nečem in tistega ne zamenjati za kaj drugega.

cit.quote: ostati pri čem, vztrajati pri čem

seg.quote: I went over the hill instead of sticking to the river.
They are sticking to their present policy.

sense.def:
To stick to a promise or agreement
pomeni storiti tako, kot smo rekli, da bomo.

seg.quote: They stuck to the bargain.

sense.def:
To stick up a picture or a notice
pomeni pritrditi sliko ali obvestilo na steno.

seg.quote: We have a painting stuck up on the wall.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj dolgega
sticks up
, je obrnjeno navzgor.

seg.quote: These plants stick up vertically from the seabed.

sense.def:
To stick up for someone or something
pomeni nekaj silovito zagovarjati ali braniti.

seg.quote: He thanked his father for sticking up for him.
I was too scared to stick up for my rights.

sense.def:
To stick with someone or something
pomeni ostati pri nekom ali nečem in ne izbrati česa drugega.

seg.quote: Stick with me and you'll be okay.
I stuck with my staple diet: brown rice.
